scripts.dev: yarn typedoc && yarn convert-admonitions && yarn fix-links && yarn fix-version && vitepress dev
scripts.build: yarn typedoc && yarn convert-admonitions && yarn fix-links && yarn fix-version && vitepress build
scripts.convert-admonitions: find api -name '*.md' -type f -exec sed -i.bak -e 's/^:::note$/:::info/g' -e 's/^:::caution$/:::warning/g' {} \; && find api -name '*.bak' -type f -delete
scripts.fix-links: find api -name '*.md' -type f -exec sed -i.bak -E 's|/docs/([^)]+)|/api/@openassistant/\1|g' {} \; && find api -name '*.bak' -type f -delete
scripts.fix-version: find api -name '*.md' -type f -exec sed -i.bak 's/Documentation v0\.0\.0/Documentation v1.0.0/g' {} \; && find api -name '*.bak' -type f -delete
